title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2527.7 - Pending proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2527.7 - Pending proceedings

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided herein or by the RSL, unless
undue hardship or prejudice results therefrom, this Code shall apply to any
proceeding pending before the DHCR, which proceeding commenced on or after

April 1, 1984, or where a provision of this Code is amended, or an applicable
statute is enacted or amended during the pendency of a proceeding, the
determination shall be made in accordance with the changed
provision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2527.7

Amended

New

York State Register November 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 45, eff. 11/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
